channel.title: Any of these?
channel.description:
My friend is sorta into evony. I think its alright but tbh i wish you could see your citizens and evony feels very unprofessional to me and rushed due to the fact that i saw 'Aquest 01 2009' and not 'August'.
What im wondering is if there's any games like evony (you can build buildings see your economy etc) and also see citizens and that is multiplayer?
Id prefer free but if there's any cheap ones like this let me know.

item.title: Any of these?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Anno 1404, I love it although there is no multiplayer you don’t really need it because you get the AI and you can manage your resources and tax and shit. I also heard East India Company with the Pirate Bay add-on is pretty decent, although you’re mainly being a pirate and shit which is completely unrelated to building and economy.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Thats not a city
